attributes.action: Make the NHS doing an ultrasounds along with mammogram For Cancer suspicions.
attributes.additional_details:
NHS should do more tests and ultrasounds along with the annual checks up for breast cancer.
Mine Cancer was missed and still doesn’t appear on the mammogram pictures.
Also,the waiting times for each appointment it’s too long,and makes ppl with cancer more anxious .
The waiting time for any appointments in the case of cancer it’s radicolous.
It’s make the pole even more vulnerable.
attributes.background:
Make the NHS doing Ultrasounds along with the mammogram in the annual check up for Breast Cancer.
My cancer was missed from the mammogram,the ultrasound shows more details and helps for yearly diagnosis for breast cancer.

rejection.details:
We are sorry to hear about your experience, but petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about annual scans are a matter for the NHS, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to fund annual ultrasounds to check for breast cancer, if that's what you want to happen.
